result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Michael Laplante Jr.

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial/scheduling conference on December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.

2:30 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. Defendant Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. appeared by phone. INCLUDES 22CF429 an 22CM368. ADA Ballo states there is not a resolution at this time. Court sets PSC on both matters, in person appearance required. DE confirms address and updates phone number. Adjourned: 2:36 PM. kma
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on October 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:49 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. Defendant Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. appeared by phone, Victim appeared by phone. INCLUDES 22CF429 and 22CM368. Discovery has been provided. Atty. Dolfi does not anticipate motions on 22CM368, requests additional time to review 22CF429. Court notes request for bond modification on 22CM368. Atty. Dolfi does not object. ADA Ballo makes note on file that he does not take a position on bond modification. Court review DE's criminal history. Court denies bond modification at this time. Court sets STC, Zoom approved. Adjourned: 3:56 PM. kma
Status conference scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Includes 22CM368 and 22CF429. Victim's Petition for Bond Modification.  gll   to EFV 8/15

10:37 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur.Prosecuting attorney Michael Becker with Student Intern Ali Casey in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. Includes 22CF429 PH and 22CM368 STC. DE confirmed address and phone number prior to case being called. Atty Casey calls Officer Elias Schendel of Hudson PD to testify. S/T Officer Schendel. Direct by Atty Casey. Officer identifies Defendant. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Witness excused. Atty Casey moves for bind over. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. ADA Becker requests to address Arraignment today, as Information will mirror the Complaint. Atty Dolfi agrees. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. NG. Waive speedy trial. Court sets STC via Zoom to allow time for Atty Dolfi to receive and review discovery for potential motions. Adjourned at 10:50 AM.  gll
Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Status conference on September 7, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Status conference on July 27, 2022 at 10:30 am.

1:08 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson.  Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi not in court.  Defendant Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. in court. Includes 22CF429 and 22CM368. Court reviews case. Court quashes stayed warrant. Court sets PH. Court confirms address and phone number. Adjourned 01:11 PM

10:25 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Joseph Michael Laplante Jr.  Defendant Joseph Michael Laplante Jr. not in court. Includes 22CF429 PH and 22CM368 STC. Court reviewed case. ADA Ballo requests warrant. Atty Dolfi requests stayed warrant until the end of the day today. Court issues warrant adjoining states- body only- on 22CF429 and statewide- body only on 22CM368- STAYED until 04:00 PM today. Adjourned 10:45 AM
10:15 - Call from Def. indicating he may be late for his 10:30 STC as he is almost out of gas. JA instructed him to contact his attorney as well. RJG

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Joseph Michael Laplante
Current: 2505 Harvester Ave E, Maplewood, MN 55119 United States  (Effective: 06-27-2022)
Prior: 1415 Main Street, #32, Houlton, WI 54082 
Per bond signed by DE.  gll

Includes 22CF429 and 22CM368.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Heather L.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Defendant may have a one time police escort to residence to retrieve personal belongings.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
Preliminary hearing on July 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.

01:36 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Lindabaur. DA:  Karl Anderson with Student Intern Ali Casey   DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi for today  DF:  Joseph Michael Laplante appeared from jail. Includes 22CF429 and 22CM368. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. PO hold. Bond argument; bond ordered. Atty Dolfi waives speedy prelim. Court sets Prelim in 22CF429 and STC in 22CM368. Court enters NG pleas in 22CM368. Atty Dolfi waives speedy trial in 22CM368. Adjourned at 1:42 PM.  gll  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 10:30 am.
